articles.title: NDC Spokesman Slams Reference of "Cheonan" Case to UN
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman Slams Reference of "Cheonan" Case to UN
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK had already officially clarified the principled stand of the army and people of the DPRK on the sinking case of the south Korean puppet navy's warship in waters of the West Sea of Korea. 
					 He also dismissed the assertion of the south Korean group of traitors that the ship was sunk by a torpedo attack of the DPRK and the "results of investigation" faked up to support it as a sheer anti-DPRK "conspiratorial farce" and a "charade".
					
					 The political, social, academic and press circles of south Korea, favoring the principled stand of the DPRK, are growing increasingly suspicious about the "results of investigation" announced by the "joint investigation team" in which it claimed it was done on an objective and scientific basis.
					
					 There is even strong opinion that the ship was sunk by the U.S.
					
					 Not only China closely following the situation around it but also Russia which dispatched an investigation group to the spot of south Korea assert that it is difficult to find out any evidence proving that the ship was sunk by a torpedo of the DPRK.
					
					 The group of traitors, however, went the lengths of bringing the investigation results to the UN, the far-fetched assertion that the ship sinking was linked with the DPRK. 
					
					 The spokesman gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday in this regard:
					
					 The development proves that the group of traitors has finally gone into action against the DPRK at the instigation of its master, defying our warnings.
					
					 Accordingly, the army and people of the DPRK will take merciless counter-actions as it had already clarified internally and externally because the group dared opt for infringing upon the dignity and security of the army and people of the DPRK and its supreme interests.
					
					 The army of the DPRK is a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which does not make any empty talk.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we will closely watch once again how the UNSC whose basic mission is to ensure global peace and security will react to the "conspiratorial farce" and "charade" orchestrated by the group of traitors.
					
					 People still remember that the UN, yielding to the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices, recognized the "existence of weapons of mass destruction", a fiction, and okayed its gangster-like armed invasion of Iraq.
					
					 The UN should no longer allow itself to be reduced to a platform for tolerating such unjust anti-DPRK "conspiratorial farce" and "charade".
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever for the group of traitors to refuse to receive the inspection group of the NDC if the results of the investigation into the case are objective and scientific enough to be referred to the UN forum. 
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its strong demand that the group of traitors receive its inspection group without delay and produce evidence without a shred of doubt in its eyes. 
					
					 The group of traitors will never be able to escape a miserable end mired in the pitfall of "conspiratorial farce" and "charade" orchestrated by itself.

articles.title: JIK Spokesman on "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
JIK Spokesman on "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Jurists Institute of Korea (JIK) in a statement on Friday bitterly denounced on behalf of all the jurists of the DPRK the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for working with blood-shot eyes to intensify the anti-DPRK smear campaign aimed at doing harm to compatriots after bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. 
					 The puppet group of traitors in south Korea cooked up the case of the warship sinking of the puppet navy in collusion with the U.S. imperialists and is passing the buck for it to the DPRK in a bid to escalate the confrontation with it, vociferating about "retaliation" and "punishment", the statement noted, and went on:  
					
					 Through the above-said case the group sought the following sinister aims: to divert elsewhere the south Korean people's anger at the most unpopular rule, fan up the confrontation with the DPRK and internationalize the moves to isolate and stifle it in collusion with outside forces hell-bent on the hostile policy toward it and bring down its dignified system.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers orchestrated the case of warship sinking in a bid to ignite another Korean war.
					
					 This is also clear from the following facts: No sooner had the case occurred than the puppet conservative group and the U.S. amassed armed forces in the waters of the West Sea of Korea, talking about "a resolute retaliation," as if they had been waiting for the incident to happen. And they launched hectic diplomacy to kick off an international campaign for "sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					
					 This bears a close resemblance to the situation when the U.S. imperialists kicked off invasion of Iraq. 
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, this is bound to spill over to the neighboring countries and then it will soon develop into a world war.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors can never shirk off the responsibility as the criminals who orchestrated the case of warship sinking.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Lee group of traitors keen to achieve the above-said purposes through the case will keenly realize what deadly retaliation the army and the people of the DPRK will take to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Philippines President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Philippines President 
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, President of the Philippines, on the occasion of the 112th anniversary of its independence.
					 Wishing for development and prosperity of the Philippines, Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop day by day.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Philippines Foreign Secretary
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Philippines Foreign Secretary
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a message of greetings to Alberto G. Romulo, secretary of Foreign Affairs of the Philippines, on the occasion of the 112th anniversary of its independence.
					 Wishing him good health and great successes in his work, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in various fields by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Friday to mark the national day of Russia.
					Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Yong Sop, vice-minister of Railways, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, Mun Song Mo, director of the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries, military attaches of foreign embassies and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					Valery Sukhinin said at the reception that steadfast is the policy of Russia to understand and cooperate with each other on the basis of the treaty of friendship, good-neighborliness and cooperation between the Russian Federation and the DPRK.
					
					He wished the friendly Korean people new success in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il as well as peace and happiness. 
					
					Pak Ui Chun in his speech said that this year marks the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the historic joint documents between the DPRK and Russia, adding that it is the desire of the peoples of the two countries to develop the bilateral relations in the spirit of the said documents.
					
					He declared that the DPRK would strengthen mutual exchange and cooperation between the two countries in different fields including politics, economy and culture.
					
					The Russian consulate general in Chongjin, too, arranged a similar reception on Thursday.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Hailed by Young People
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Hailed by Young People
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting to follow the positive example set by leading characters of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, was held by officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on June 10.
					 Present there were officials of the Central Committee of the league and other youth league officials in Pyongyang.
					
					Speakers at the meeting said that the light comedy, highly appreciated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il as another monumental masterpiece representing the literature and arts in the era of Songun, was created in the era of the Chollima movement but it still serves as a work of deep impression replete with ample cognitive and educational significance because it instigates the young people to bring about creation and innovation.
					
					 The light comedy brought them closer to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il to make the "Echo of Mountain" reverberate far and wide as an echo of great innovation and leap forward in the drive to build a thriving nation in the Songun era just as it did in the era of the Chollima movement, encouraging people to perform miracles and feats, they said.
					
					 They noted that the comedy serves as a true textbook of life teaching the youth vanguard how they should work to implement the line and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They said that they would discharge their duty in the on-going general offensive for the improvement of the standard of people's living with the far-reaching ambition and high ideal just as leading characters of the work did.

articles.title: New Round of Premier League Soccer Begins
articles.content:
New Round of Premier League Soccer Begins
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The fourth round of the premier league soccer matches has begun at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Thursday.
					Participating in the matches are eleven male and eight female teams.
					
					In the first day's men's matches the Ponghwasan team and the Amnokgang team defeated the Ministry of the Light Industry team and the Mangyongbong team 3:0 and 4:1 respectively.
					
					The Rimyongsu and Sobaeksu men's teams and the April 25 women's team are expected to make a strong claim for the title.
					
					These teams gained good results in the previous three rounds. 
					
					The fourth round continues till July 17.

articles.title: Bean-flour Drink Given to Children and Students
articles.content:
Bean-flour Drink Given to Children and Students
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea and the state are entirely responsible for the healthy growth of the children in the DPRK. A large quantity of bean-flour drink is being mass-produced and provided to all children and students everyday as required by the science of nutrition. 
					 The "time for bean-flour drink" for the children and students reflects the WPK's noble view on the younger generation and the true nature of the best Korean-style socialism in the world.
					
					 The Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory has so far produced more than 300 million liters of nutritive bean-flour drink so it might be provided to the nurseries, kindergartens and primary and secondary schools in the city everyday.
					
					The vans carrying bean-flour drink are called "vans for kings." The total distance covered by these vans reached a total of 14,150,000 kms which equal to 354 trips around the world.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made sure that the above-said factory was built in the city and that even a workshop for nutritive milk was set up for children in Juche 68 (1979).
					
					 1986 witnessed the start of bean-flour drink at the factory. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il unraveled all the knotty problems arising in the production of the above-said drink. He set the best time from the viewpoint of the science of nutrition as the time for serving the drink and took a special measure for enabling all the children and students in the city to have the drink simultaneously.
					
					 This unfolded a spectacular scene in which the above-said vans run along the streets of the city under a well-regulated supply system. These vans are given top priority in traffic in all the streets so that they may reach their destinations without a hitch.
					
					 An order of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was issued to solve the issues arising in the production and supply of the drink even in the period of the "Arduous March", the forced march.
					
					 There sprang up bean-flour drink production centers in different parts of the country. It has now become a rule for the provincial, city and county committees of the WPK and the people's committees to solve promptly all matters ranging from the provision of raw materials to the production and supply of the drink in a responsible manner. 
					
					 Bean-flour drink production facilities are found in cities, counties and ris of Jagang Province to put the supply of the drink to all children and students there on a regular basis.

articles.title: Ardent Revolutionary of Indomitable Spiritual Strength
articles.content:
Ardent Revolutionary of Indomitable Spiritual Strength
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Ju, a younger brother of President Kim Il Sung, was an ardent revolutionary who lived a brilliant life with an indomitable spiritual strength.
					 He, who grew up, receiving a patriotic and revolutionary education from his family members, remained faithful to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung till the last moments of his life in the struggle for the liberation of the country. 
					
					 While active in the Saenal Children's Union, he conducted art propaganda activities for enlightening the popular masses and carried out revolutionary tasks in a responsible manner such as the publication and distribution of newspaper Saenal (new day).
					
					 In the days of giving himself up to the work of the Young Communist League, he personally created revolutionary songs and dramas to encourage many young people to the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 His spiritual strength was fully displayed in the effort for implementing the President's line on forming a united front.
					
					 It was a very dangerous task to form a united front with Chinese anti-Japanese units that, deceived by the Japanese imperialists' policy of national split and anti-communist propaganda, were antagonizing the Korean nation and killing Korean revolutionaries unreasonably.
					
					 Nevertheless, he did not hesitate to go to the units and persuade them into a united front with outstanding stratagem, profound insight and persevering efforts.
					
					 He, who distinguished himself in Yangcaogou, Badaogou, Dadianzi, Fuerhe and many other battles against the Japanese aggressors, died a heroic death near Chechangzi in June Juche 24 (1935). 
					
					 His life gives a truth that a revolutionary who devoted himself to the country and the nation with an indomitable spirit is always alive in the mind of the people and in the history of the country.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Disclose Inside Story about "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Disclose Inside Story about "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is seeking to build up public opinion about the case of warship sinking at the UN forum, in an ulterior purpose to keep the truth behind its anti-DPRK farce buried into oblivion for good and intensify the campaign for confrontation and war against compatriots under the pretext of the above-said case. 
					 Minju Joson Friday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 As soon as the DPRK National Defence Commission at a press conference irrefutably disclosed with perfect logic and specific data that the case of warship sinking was a conspiratorial farce orchestrated by the group in league with its U.S. masters, foreign media lost no time to spotlight its account and the south Korean people and the world progressives demanded that the group probe the truth behind the case, before anything else, the commentary notes, and goes on to say: 
					
					 Much upset by this development, the group staged a charade "refuting" what was stated at the press conference and is making desperate efforts to make the above-said hideous case an established fact.
					
					 The truth about the case which claimed the lives of dozens of seamen is bound to be brought to light any time. It is as clear as noonday that if the truth about the case will be brought to light with the passage of time, this will throw the group into the very trap which had been dug for others. 
					
					 The group, seized with such uneasiness and fear, is working with bloodshot eyes to prevent the truth about the case from being disclosed anymore. 
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the group brought up the case for discussion at the UN despite the domestic and foreign protest and denunciation even before the truth behind it was probed. It did so out of nervousness and uneasiness that the flow of time might lead to the disclosure of the inside story about its farce.
					
					 The Lee group had better confess to the fact that the case of warship sinking was an unprecedented anti-DPRK farce, though belatedly, and step down, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Outbursts Snubbed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Outbursts Snubbed
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak at a "working breakfast with the group of diplomatic and security advisors" on June 9 asserted that "it is important to take a resolute approach" toward the north, urging them to consistently pursue without vacillation "the diplomatic and security policy" such as the issue of the warship "Cheonan," etc. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This is nothing but a suicidal act as it is as foolish an act as keeping to the road already chosen, utterly indifferent to the public opinion and reality.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak would have been better to face up to the trend of the times and roll back his foolish confrontation policy, though belatedly. But his call for "taking resolute approach" and the like suggests that he is not yet awake from his daydream of escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 He is taking much pains to tone down the mounting call of not only progressive forces but elements among the ruling forces for modifying the "hard-line policy toward the north" in the wake of their defeat in the "elections". 
					
					 This once again brought to light the true colors of Lee as a wicked traitor persistently whipping his minions on to rush headlong into confrontation and war, defying the public mind-set. 
					
					 Lee had better to stop talking nonsense. 
					
					 The south Korean conservative group would be well advised to mind its tongue if it does not want to face a strong retaliation of the DPRK.

articles.title: 6.15 Declaration Hailed as Great Program for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
6.15 Declaration Hailed as Great Program for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as immortal great programmes for independent reunification as they clearly indicate the way to be followed by the Korean nation in the efforts to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity while meeting all challenges of the separatist forces, Rodong Sinmun says in a signed article Friday.
					 The June 15 joint declaration, the most just one reflecting the desire and demand of the nation for the independent reunification, clarifies the fundamental principles for national reunification.
					
					 National reunification should be achieved by the efforts of the Korean nation independent of foreign forces as clarified by the joint declaration.
					
					 The Koreans in the north and the south have not yet achieved the reunification of the country, so much desired by them, even though its division has lasted more than half a century. One of its main reasons lies in the south Korean ruling forces' treachery of having persisted in the policy of sycophancy towards the U.S. and dependence on outside forces.
					
					 The principle of national independence is clearly reflected in the idea of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the joint declaration.
					
					 "By our nation itself" is the basic spirit and hard core of the June 15 joint declaration. The declaration injected the truth that national reunification should be independently achieved, free from foreign forces, into the hearts of all Koreans as a great motto of "By our nation itself", a popular and patriotic one acceptable to every Korean.
					
					 The declaration has fully demonstrated its vitality in practice.
					
					It is the truth taught by history and the reality that the adherence to the declaration and its implementation guarantee the existence of the Korean nation and its peace and reunification.
					
					 Denial of the joint declaration would lead to confrontation and collapse of inter-Korean relations. All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should launch a more dynamic struggle to defend and implement the joint declaration and thus decorate this year with success in the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Full Play to Popular Heroism Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Popular Heroism Called for
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially says that popular heroism is the traditional fighting spirit and work style fully displayed by the army and people of the DPRK in the protracted Songun revolution and serves as a powerful engine for winning a victory in the ongoing advance for a great surge. 
					 It goes on:
					
					Their popular heroism represents the spirit of dynamically advancing in single-minded unity, breathing the same breath with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and keeping pace with him in his forced march. It also means an expression of the strong determination of the nation to build a thriving socialist nation in the spirit of self-reliance at any cost.
					
					 The single-minded unity is not only a symbol of invincibility of Songun Korea but a fundamental source of the strength of all the servicepersons and people to perform heroic feats.  
					
					 It is the strong resolution of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to boldly dash ahead toward a final victory with confident pluck and fixed will to build a thriving nation on this land by completing at one go the job done by others by making a thousand tries. 
					
					 Herculean are the tasks before us but the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be crowned with victory as long as there are the experienced and tested leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and the heroic fighting spirit of all the servicepersons and people single-mindedly united around the Party and the leader. 
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the servicepersons and people to give full play to popular heroism in the ongoing general offensive and thus glorify this year as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Immortal Exploits of WPK Praised
articles.content:
Immortal Exploits of WPK Praised
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The long history in which General Secretary Kim Jong Il has steered the Workers' Party of Korea is the one in which he has led the cause of Korean-style socialism to a brilliant victory along the road indicated by President Kim Il Sung, and all the exploits performed by him in this course are distinguished ones to remain shining forever in the history of the struggle to achieve the prosperity of the country and accomplish the human cause of independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The greatest of the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the history of the socialist movement is that he provided encyclopedic ideological and theoretical treasures for accomplishing the cause of socialism despite any tempest of history, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It owes to him that the Juche idea, the guiding idea of Korean-style socialism, was developed in depth in all fields and perfect answers were given to a lot of ideological and theoretical issues hard to clarify with the existing theories and the DPRK came to shed its rays as an ideological power having an ever-victorious idea and philosophy.
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its dignity as a country where the whole party and society are modeled on the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung who pioneered the cause of socialism and as an invincible power in which all servicepersons and people are single-mindedly united around the headquarters of the revolution and socialism formed a community linked by the same destiny.
					
					 The capability of the Korean People's Army has been bolstered up in every way and the DPRK is shedding its rays as an invincible military power thanks to the dynamic Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 No matter how desperately the enemies may kick up their campaign against the DPRK, it remains strong in its mettle and all the servicepersons and people are confidently advancing along the road of triumphant socialism full of faith and optimism thanks to its invincible military strength. 
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il ushered in a new era for victory in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation with such rare leadership art as turning adversity into a favorable situation and encouraging the people to effect an uninterrupted leap forward, the article stresses: The Korean people will convey his exploits down to posterity and remain single-mindedly true to his ideas and leadership and thus accomplish the socialist cause of Juche that started in the forests of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: S. Korea Fails in Satellite Launch
articles.content:
S. Korea Fails in Satellite Launch 
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- South Korea failed in the launch of a satellite on Thursday, according to south Korean KBS and MBC.
					 The satellite crashed after reaching an altitude of 70 km in just 137 seconds after its takeoff at 17:01.
					
					 It is the second time that south Korea failed in the satellite launch since its first failure in August last year, the reports said.

articles.title: Russian Media Call for Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
Russian Media Call for Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Golos Russii on June 7 quoted the director of the Center for Korean Studies of the Far East Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences as saying as regards the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking: 
					 The case of warship's sinking is beset with many contradictions.
					
					 One of them is a question. If it is true that "Cheonan" was sunk by a torpedo attack from a mini-sub of the DPRK, where did that mini-sub flee? Warships of the U.S. and south Korea equipped with modern monitoring system were busy with military exercises in those waters at that time.
					
					 There are some assertions that the case was a politically motivated provocation.
					
					 It is, therefore, necessary to clarify the cause of the warship sinking and ferret out the chief culprit.
					
					 It is our view that the tension on the Korean Peninsula should not be escalated.
					
					 The Golos Russii also quoted what a reporter of the Ria-Novosti News said after looking round the hull of "Cheonan" displayed in a base in Phyongthaek, south Korea.
					
					  He expressed strong doubt about the "results of investigation" made public by an "inspection team". If the DPRK sought the so-called "retaliation" as claimed by the south side, why should it have conducted the operation at a time when large-scale joint military exercises were underway in the waters of the West Sea with even the nuclear sub of the U.S. forces equipped with an early warning system involved? he questioned.
					
					 He held that south Korea used the case for adopting an arms buildup plan envisaging the shipment of many more weapons from the U.S., etc. while Japan exploited it for hastily retracting from its earlier decision on the pullback of all the U.S. troops from Okinawa where more than half of its forces in Japan are stationed.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Slammed
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kamwiziku Octave, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on May 31 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors.
					 He in the statement accused the Western media of getting frantic with the groundless mud-slinging at the DPRK over the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking.
					
					 As a matter of fact, an objective observation of what is happening on the Korean Peninsula suggests that it is attributable to the division of the Korean nation which has lasted for more than half a century, he said, adding:
					
					 Now that the imperialist powers are wantonly infringing upon the interests of other countries and nations in the world and exploiting them, the Juche idea undoubtedly serves as an idea indicating the only way of achieving human emancipation and the sovereignty of each country and nation. 
					
					 We, therefore, express full support for the Korean people in their heroic struggle to achieve the reunification of the country under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to halt their plots against the DPRK at once, respond to the proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and discontinue the act of running counter to all Koreans' desire to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification in line with the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in the Czech Republic and a lecture and a film show in Guinea on June 2 and Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions opened in Russia, Peru and Nigeria between June 1 and 3 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Present at the events were personages of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, the Kurgan Regional Administration of Russia, the Ricardo Palma University of Peru, the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and the Council of Art and Culture of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria and masses. 
					
					 The participants of the film show appreciated the Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea". 
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were works of the peerlessly great men, photos on their undying exploits, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- One day in November, Juche 86 (1997) General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected different units of the Korean People's Army from early morning.
					 It got dark when he climbed down from a forward command post on a snow-covered height. 
					
					 He, however, told the officials accompanying him that he had one more unit to inspect.
					
					 With the officials being afraid it was too late to go to another unit, he said that be it ever so late, he wanted to visit a coastal unit as its servicepersons were taking much trouble, exposed to cold wind, to defend the country.
					
					 When Kim Jong Il arrived at the post, the servicepersons of the company were surprised by his night visit.
					
					 After exchanging greetings with them, he said he came to learn about their living condition.
					
					 He went round the barracks, mess, education room and other places of the company in the darkness for hours to take good care of their life.
					
					He left the company at midnight.

articles.title: ONU no es espacio para tolerar la "farsa" anti-RPDC, sentencia CDN
articles.content:
ONU no es espacio para tolerar la "farsa" anti-RPDC, sentencia CDN
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ya ha expuesto oficialmente al interior y al exterior del pais la posicion de principios de nuestro ejercito y pueblo en cuanto al caso de hundimiento del buque de la marina de guerra surcoreana ocurrido en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					  En particular, ha calificado de "farsa" y "complot" anti-RPDC la insistencia de la banda de traidores surcoreanos en que su buque de guerra fue hundido por el ataque de nuestro torpedo y el "resultado de investigacion" falsificado para argumentarla.
					
					  En sintonia con nuestra posicion de principios, crecen en los circulos politico, social, academico y de prensa del Sur de Corea las sospechas del llamado "resultado de investigacion" del "grupo de investigacion conjunta", del cual los titeres surcoreanos dicen que fue garantizado su caracter objetivo y cientifico.
					
					  Ademas, hoy dia, se presentan hasta los criterios de que el hundimiento fue causado por EE.UU.
					
					  Tanto China, que observa atentamente la situacion en su contorno, como Rusia, que envio a su grupo de investigacion al lugar de los hechos en el Sur de Corea, afirman que es imposible encontrar las pruebas materiales que atribuyan el naufragio al torpedo de la RPDC.
					
					  Sin embargo, comenzo por fin la locura de la camarilla surcoreana de remitir a la ONU su opinion y resultado de investigacion falsificados en ese sentido.
					
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del CDN de la RPDC se entrevisto el dia 11 con la ATCC y dio la siguiente respuesta:
					
					  Tal movimiento demuestra que pese a la advertencia nuestra, la banda de traidores surcoreanos entro por fin en la accion practica contra la RPDC a instigacion de su amo.
					
					  Por lo tanto, nuestro ejercito y pueblo tomaran las implacables contramedidas como ya habian anunciado al interior y al exterior del pais.
					
					Es porque la banda traidora se atrevio a entrar en el camino de perjudicar la dignidad y la seguridad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y los intereses supremos de nuestro Estado.
					
					  Nuestro ejercito es el revolucionario del monte Paektu con inagotable poderio que no habla en vano.
					
					  Aprovechando esta ocasion, volveremos a observar con alta vigilancia como trata esa "farsa" y "complot" de la banda traidora el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que tiene su mision principal en preservar la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Los hombres no olvidan todavia el hecho de que ONU, doblegada ante el despotismo y arbitrariedad de EE.UU., dio su aprobacion a la gangsteril invasion armada a Irak reconociendo la falsa "existencia de las armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					  La ONU no debe servir mas de espacio para tolerar las injusticias como la "farsa" y "complot" anti-RPDC de los traidores surcoreanos.
					
					  Si el resultado de investigacion del incidente fuera tan objetivo y cientifico para ser llevado al escenario internacional, la banda traidora no tendria ninguna causa que le impida aceptar el grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					  Urgimos fuertemente ahora tambien a la banda traidora surcoreana aceptar de inmediato a nuestro grupo de inspeccion y presentarle las pruebas materiales de que no quepa ni la mas minima duda.
					
					  La banda traidora no podra evitar su vergonzoso fin cayendose en esa trampa tendida por si misma.

articles.title: Portavoz de la AJC condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Portavoz de la AJC condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ATCC) -- Condenamos severamente en nombre de todos los juristas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que libra demencialmente la campana conflictiva con aquella con la meta de romper totalmente las relaciones Norte-Sur y calumniar a los connacionales. 
					  Asi senalo el portavoz de la Asociacion de Juristas de Corea (AJC) en su declaracion del dia 11 y continuo:
					
					La banda traidora titere del Sur de Corea invento el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta del ejercito surcoreano en contubernio con los imperialistas yanquis y habla tanto de la "represalia" y "castigo" imputando la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					  Mediante el citado caso, la banda traidora trata de eliminar el muy digno sistema de la RPDC al conducir a la confrontacion fratricida la opinion publica surcoreana, indignada por la brutal dominacion antipopular, y al dar dimension internacional a su campana para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas que practican la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					  Los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres orquestaron el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra surcoreano para utilizarlo como pretexto de la provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					  De ahi que tan pronto como estallara el incidente, envian colosales fuerzas armadas al Mar Oeste de Corea hablando de la supuesta "reaccion rotunda" y andan ajetreados en los escenarios internacionales para aplicar la "sancion" contra la RPDC.
					
					  Esto hace imaginar aquel tiempo en que los yanquis intentaban agredir a Irak.
					
					  Si se desata la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, esta guerra cobrara pronto la dimension mundial porque es inevitable que se involucren en ella los otros paises vecinos.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak no podra liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad criminal de haber fraguado el naufragio de su propio buque de guerra.
					
					  Los imperialistas yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak veran cuan terrible sera el contraataque del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea por defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad nacional.

articles.title: Minju Joson demanda confesar el secreto del caso de "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Minju Joson demanda confesar el secreto del caso de "Cheonan"
						
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado el viernes, el periodico Minju Joson revelo que al llevar a la ONU el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", la banda de Lee Myung Bak trata de dejar en el olvido de la historia la verdad de ese complot anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y endurecer pretextandolo la campana conflictiva y belica contra los connacionales.
					  Las fuentes extranjeras transmitieron rapido bajo grandes titulares la entrevista de prensa concedida por el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, en la cual se revelo de modo convincente con argumentos y datos justos que el hundimiento de la "Cheonan" es la farsa ideada por la banda de traidores surcoreanos en confabulacion con su amo gringo, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Por otra parte, el pueblo surcoreano y la humanidad progresista del mundo demandan esclarecer la verdad del incidente.
					
					  Atemorizada ante esta tendencia, la banda traidora se esfuerza ingentemente por convertir su gran farsa en un hecho consumado tratando de "refutar" los argumentos presentados en la rueda de prensa del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					Es una cuestion de tiempo la revelacion del secreto de esa farsa inventada por la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak sacrificando en masas a los inocentes soldados.
					
					  A sabiendas de que de revelarse ese secreto, caeria en la trampa tendida por si misma, la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos esta muy inquietada y pavorida e impide a toda costa la revelacion total del incidente.
					
					  De ahi que remitio a la ONU el caso del "Cheonan" no esclarecido todavia pese a la protesta y la denuncia de la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					  Aunque ya es tarde, la banda de Lee Myung Bak deberia retirarse del poder tras confesar que es un invento suyo ese complot anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Iniciada 4a competencia de superliga de futbol
articles.content:
Iniciada 4a competencia de superliga de futbol
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ATCC) -- Tiene lugar  a partir del dia 10 en el capitalino Estadio            Kim Il Sung la cuarta competencia de futbol de todos contra todos de nivel superior.
					En esta competencia toman parte 11 equipos masculinos y 8 femeninos.
					
					En los partidos de los equipos masculinos que tuvieron lugar el primer dia, el once Ponghwasan vencio tres por cero al otro del Ministerio de Industria Ligera, y el Amnokgang al Mangyongbong cuatro por uno.
					
					Los equipos que los especialistas y los aficionados al futbol consideran como candidatos a los ganadores en la presente superliga son los equipos Rimyongsu y Sobaeksu (m) y el equipo 25 de Abril (f).
					
					Anteriormente estos equipos obtuvieron buenos resultados en la primera competencia de superliga de futbol, el torneo de futbol de nivel superior de la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Mangyongdae y en la superliga de futbol de la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Antorcha de Pochonbo.
					
					El torneo continua hasta el 17 de julio.
